name: You Wake Up From A Horrible Dream
name_original: You Wake Up From A Horrible Dream
description:
Controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move and interact with items. Please don't forget to interact with the items in your room! Every time an item appears, it has different dialogue!

My first 'game'! It's mostly dialogue, and should only take you like 3 minutes to complete. It's super short, haha! This was made in 1 hour using bitsy, and is a little adventure about middle school, maladaptive daydreams, and the pain of loss.
